name: The Complete Pokemon Dataset
data_intro: This dataset contains information on all 802 Pokemon from all Seven Generations of Pokemon. The information contained in this dataset include Base Stats, Performance against Other Types, Height, Weight, Classification, Egg Steps, Experience Points, Abilities, etc. The information was scraped from http://serebii.net/

cat_feature_intro.abilities: * **abilities:** A stringified list of abilities that the Pokemon is capable of having
cat_feature_intro.japanese_name: * **japanese_name:** The Original Japanese name of the Pokemon
cat_feature_intro.name: * **japanese_name:** The Original Japanese name of the Pokemon
cat_feature_intro.type1: * **type1:** The Primary Type of the Pokemon
cat_feature_intro.type2: * **type2:** The Secondary Type of the Pokemon

num_feature_intro.attack: * **sp_attack:** The Base Special Attack of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.base_egg_steps: * **base_egg_steps:** The number of steps required to hatch an egg of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.defense: * **sp_defense:** The Base Special Defense of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.experience_growth: * **experience_growth:** The Experience Growth of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.height_m: * **height_m:** Height of the Pokemon in metres
num_feature_intro.hp: * **hp:** The Base HP of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.percentage_male: * **percentage_male:** The percentage of the species that are male. Blank if the Pokemon is genderless.
num_feature_intro.pokedex_number: * **pokedex_number:** The entry number of the Pokemon in the National Pokedex
num_feature_intro.sp_attack: * **sp_attack:** The Base Special Attack of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.sp_defense: * **sp_defense:** The Base Special Defense of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.speed: * **speed:** The Base Speed of the Pokemon
num_feature_intro.weight_kg: * **weight_kg:** The Weight of the Pokemon in kilograms
num_feature_intro.generation: * **generation:** The numbered generation which the Pokemon was first introduced
num_feature_intro.is_legendary: * **is_legendary:** Denotes if the Pokemon is legendary.
